alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Hardin; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 10:17AM EST until February 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Mercer, Auglaize and Hardin Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain will develop this afternoon. Mainly sleet and freezing rain are expected this evening, before changing to snow overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iln as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
